about_me.title: About me
about_me.paragraph1: I love turning ideas into real projects. Coding gives me the same creative joy as cooking — experimenting, improving, and shaping things until they’re just right.
about_me.paragraph2: I’m based in Regensburg and fully open to remote or hybrid work—flexibility helps me do my best work.
about_me.paragraph3: I enjoy exploring new technologies and building up my skill set step by step—continuous learning keeps me motivated.
about_me.paragraph4: I learn something from every mistake I make. Think of it as my built-in upgrade system—I get a little better with each version.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: I have hands-on experience with a variety of front-end tools — from JavaScript and Angular to Scrum — creating interactive and responsive user experiences.
skills.question: Looking for another skill?
skills.followup: Feel free to reach out — I’m always excited to learn new things.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.text: This website collects only the data necessary to operate and respond to inquiries:

contactData.title: Contact Data
contactData.text: name, email address, and message when you contact me.

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.text: IP address, browser type, device information — automatically collected by the hosting provider to ensure functionality and security.

purpose.title: Purpose & Legal Basis
purpose.text: Personal data is processed solely to operate this website, respond to messages, and maintain technical security. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: Data is shared only with the hosting provider for technical operation under GDPR-compliant conditions. No personal data is sold or shared with third parties for marketing.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text1: You may request access, correction, deletion, or restriction of your personal data, or object to processing at any time.

retention.title: Retention
retention.text: Contact messages are stored only as long as needed to respond to your inquiry. Technical log files are retained only briefly for security and troubleshooting.
